title: Dysadron's Author Page
content:
[[module CSS]]
.gray-image {
    filter: grayscale(100%);
}

.gray-image:hover {
    filter: none;
}

#page-content hr {
border-top: none;
height: .1em;
background: #7b4b90;
}

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-lgbt-alt= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]

Check out more of my articles on my author p- wait, you're already here!

Thanks to [[*user Pedagon]] for helping me get the info bar set-up, and to [[*user Stormbreath]] for providing me with the CSS for the images.
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[=]]
Hi there, welcome to my author page!
[[/=]]
I've been a fan of the site for over a decade, and became an active member in 2018. It's awesome being able to contribute to the site, and hopefully you enjoy some of the things I've written! I'm based in the UK, and am always happy to crit a draft if you see me around on chat. Aware this page is a bit bare bones at the moment, but hopefully there'll be more articles added over the coming months.

------
